snippet: The artist Oscar Murillo, who just turned 28, has experienced the wild ride from struggling art student to a hot star in the art world firmament.
abstract: Artist Oscar Murillo is being called 21st-century Basquiat by his fans, but he is trying to tune out noise of marketplace and keep his eyes on his work; 28-year-old has experienced wild ride from struggling art student to current hot star of art world; Murillo's story reflects way investing in contemporary art has become gamble, like stocks and real estate.
lead_paragraph: The artist Oscar Murillo, who just turned 28, has experienced the wild ride from struggling art student to a hot star in the art world firmament.

headline.seo: Oscar Murillo Keeps His Eyes on the Canvas
